title: Van Heusen Men's Big and Tall Flex Collar Stretch Dress Shirt
description: Flex collar: stretches up to half an inch for expandable comfort. Stretch fabric: stretches and moves with you for extra comfort. Wrinkle free: developed for less wrinkles and easy care.
Tall fit: Designed with added length in the sleeve and body, This fit offers style and comfort for taller men
Spread collar: modern traditional collar with the tips pointed outwards, allowing for tie knots of all sizes; can be worn with or without neckwear
Adjustable cuff: two button positions allow for a more customized, improved fit
Chest pocket: classic design holds all your essentials
Van Heusen Mens Tall Fit Dress Shirt Flex Collar Stretch Solid (Big And Tall)
